snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry warned Monday that the violent civil conflict, mass displacement and deepening food crisis roiling South Sudan were threatening its future.
abstract: United States allocates $5 million for creation of special court to try perpetrators of atrocities in South Sudan; Sec of State John Kerry warns that young country is at severe risk from food crisis, civil unrest and mass displacements.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry warned Monday that the violent civil conflict, mass displacement and deepening food crisis roiling South Sudan were threatening its future.

headline.main: South Sudan: World’s Youngest Nation Is ‘at Grave Risk,’ Kerry Warns
